name: United States of Greater Austria
startIntroPart1: By the Grace of God, all hail Kaiser Karl I, emperor of Austria! Great and holy Austria is the legal descendant of the Roman Empire through the Holy Roman Empire. As such, Austria holds preeminence upon the rulers of Christendom. Austria holds dominion over Hungary, Bohemia, the Triune Kingdom of Croatia, Bosnia, Transylvania, southern Poland and northern Italy. Despite multiple wars, Austria endures! As long as Austria stands, Christendom lives!
startIntroPart2: Your Imperial and Royal Majesty, the peoples of the Empire are asking you to help lead the Empire to victory against all those who oppose it! Will you uphold Christendom? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
attacked: I will only receive your utter submission!
defeated: The defeat of Austria is the death of Christendom. Dark times are upon us all.
introduction: As the emperor of Austria, you are worthy of my attention.
tradeRequest: You will have the privilege of trading with me.
